name: Petting Zoo Pals - Clicker Game
description:
Ever wondered what it would be like to own a petting zoo or petting farm with super cute baby animals that you the zoo keeper can look after and play with all day long?

Wonder no more, Petting Zoo Pals is here for you!

There are four super cute animals to unlock for your petting zoo: Sheep, Cow, Chick, and Rabbit. Just open the wooden case and introduce your new animal friend to their new home.

HOW TO PLAY

Tap your Petting Zoo Pal to earn coins with which you can buy level ups, hats or even more cute little animals for your petting zoo club.

There are lots of cool hats that can be unlocked to dress up your pet pals in including:
clown hat, nurse vet hat, cowboy sheriff hat, birthday party hat, princess tiara and much more!

Your pets love to party, once your party meter is full its time to throw an epic disco party for all your animal friends, which leads to mega coins earned for you!

While your petting pets are partying you can pop balloons for even more extra bonus coins.

While petting your animal pals, cookie or Fruit can pop up feed this treat to your animal pet and it will temporarily boost your clicker power X2!

How many coins can you collect and can you level up to build your very own Petting Zoo empire!

FREATURES:

* Super cute Animal friends to love and care for.

* Funny and cute hats to dress up your pets in.

* Simple but addicting RPG/Clicker level up system.

* Have Disco Parties to blast your coin count through the roof!

* Cookie and Fruit can temporarily boost your clicker power.


Petting Zoo Pals is a free super fun idle/clicker game which is easy to play but hard to put down. It's great for kids and adults alike.

Petting Zoo Pals – Clicker Game, animal toys can also be collected in our other game Toy Egg Surprise 2.
